thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Wednesday, 18 Apr 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Roots Q4 Total Sales Increased 17 Pct To $130 Mln

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Roots Q4 Total Sales Increased 17 Pct To $130 Mln
text:
April 18 (Reuters) - Roots Corp:
* ROOTS REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER AND YEAR-END FISCAL 2017 RESULTS
* QTRLY TOTAL SALES INCREASED 17.0% TO $130.0 MILLION COMPARED TO Q4 FISCAL 2016
* QTRLY BASIC EARNINGS PER SHARE $0.50 * QTRLY ADJUSTED NET INCOME PER SHARE INCREASED 22.9% TO $0.59 PER SHARE COMPARED TO Q4 2016
* REMAINS ON TRACK TO ACHIEVE ITS PREVIOUSLY STATED FINANCIAL TARGETS BY END OF FISCAL 2019
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE VIEW C$0.53, REVENUE VIEW C$124.4 MILLION â€” THOMSON REUTERS I/B/E/S Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
